item.description:
We had a great time celebrating the start of summer...hard to believe its almost September! Its about time for another party before launching into more serious fall pursuits (serious can still be fun, right?)....

This event will be for several of Trish's meetups – a great chance to cross-pollinate! You never know what creativity, innovation and provocative thoughts can come from the mix of entrepreneurship, arts, sustainability, spirituality and EROS!

For those of you that are single – wear a sticker on your badge to show your interest in meeting other singles. Join us for some great company, stimulating conversation and DANCING!!!

Also a great low risk way to meet others from the group if you haven't yet been to an event.

Please Bring: Something significant to share such as a good bottle of wine, an appetizer or dessert AND/OR* $10 to contribute towards the expenses of the night. Your contributions are very appreciated!! (If you are unable to contribute for any reason please come anyway.) :)

Loose Schedule:
Conversation, Networking, General Schmoozing: 7-9pm
Dancing and General Merriment: 9-12am
Hanging out: 12am til….

Parking permits and time limits have been lifted around my house by the city of Somerville for the night of the party. If you get a ticket let me know and I’ll send you the contact for the person that can take care of it for you.  My house is also only a 5 minute walk from the Porter Square T-stop on the Redline. Parking at Alewife garage and taking the T two stops is a pretty easy option if you don’t want to have to park in the city.

Hope you can make it!

Feel free to call 413-320-3991 or email me at trish@trishblain.com if you have any questions. Feel free to bring friends or significant others.
item.name: End of Summer House Party
